channel.title: Uh.. problem with bows
channel.description:
yeh.. my bows crash my server... didnt used to... this is what my run server says when i killed my test guy with c bow
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 11 at client.PKz(client.java:20214) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20325) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20315) at client.process(client.java:14419) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:48) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1565 Client type: low memory version UserId: 31303585 marc is signing onto server. [client-3-marc]: marc is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1568 Client type: low memory version UserId: 85198510 testdude is signing onto server. [client-4-testdude]: testdude is already online. [/code]
not sure if thats relevent :/
killed him again with mage/melle no error like that, whats wrong with it..lol[br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2007, 09:52:41 PM[/size][hr]yeh, i know double post and all but i waited till this was on page 5 instead of jus making a new one,
please help meh.. idk why it does it :/

item.title: Uh.. problem with bows
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

yeh… my bows crash my server… didnt used to… this is what my run server says when i killed my test guy with c bow

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 11 at client.PKz(client.java:20214) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20325) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20315) at client.process(client.java:14419) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:48) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1565 Client type: low memory version UserId: 31303585 marc is signing onto server. [client-3-marc]: marc is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1568 Client type: low memory version UserId: 85198510 testdude is signing onto server. [client-4-testdude]: testdude is already online.

not sure if thats relevent

killed him again with mage/melle no error like that, whats wrong with it…lol[br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2007, 09:52:41 PM[/size][hr]yeh, i know double post and all but i waited till this was on page 5 instead of jus making a new one,

please help meh… idk why it does it
